state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! First of all, attempt to venture west. And then, make an effort to take a trip west. After that, travel west. And then, head north. With that done, go north. And then, make an attempt to take a trip west. And then, attempt to go to the north. And then, go to the east. Then, make an effort to head east. Next, try to go east. Okay, and then, make an effort to move south. That done, go to the south. And then, make an attempt to venture west. After that, pick-up the gummy bear from the floor of the chamber. Alright, thanks! -= Bedchamber =- I am obligated to announce that you are now in the bedchamber. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Bedchamber =-0/1
